channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- AR100,AR100-S,AR110-S,AR120,AR120-S,AR1200,AR1200-S,AR150,AR150-S,AR160,AR200,AR200-S,AR2200,AR2200-S,AR3200,AR510,DP300,NetEngine16EX,RP200,SRG1300,SRG2300,SRG3300,TE30,TE40,TE50,TE60,TP3106,TP3206,ViewPoint 8660,ViewPoint 9030
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- AR100,AR100-S,AR110-S,AR120,AR120-S,AR1200,AR1200-S,AR150,AR150-S,AR160,AR200,AR200-S,AR2200,AR2200-S,AR3200,AR510,DP300,NetEngine16EX,RP200,SRG1300,SRG2300,SRG3300,TE30,TE40,TE50,TE60,TP3106,TP3206,ViewPoint 8660,ViewPoint 9030

item.description: Huawei AR100, AR100-S, AR110-S, AR120, AR120-S, AR1200, AR1200-S, AR150, AR150-S, AR160, AR200, AR200-S, AR2200, AR2200-S, AR3200, AR510, DP300, NetEngine16EX, RP200, SRG1300, SRG2300, SRG3300, TE30, TE40, TE50, TE60, TP3106, TP3206, ViewPoint 8660, and ViewPoint 9030 have an insufficient validation vulnerability. Since packet validation is insufficient, an unauthenticated attacker may send special H323 packets to exploit the vulnerability. Successful exploit could allow the attacker to send malicious packets and result in DOS attacks.
